item.title: Heritage Church CPC
item.description:
Psalm 15, KJV

**Upload date 8/25/17 **Download an MP3 of Psalm 15, Version 4 here. **Download an MP3 of Psalm 15, Version 5 here.

Well it’s been a hot August here in SW Virginia, but the weather is finally cooling off and the mornings are beginning to smell like fall - my favorite time of year.

If you’re ready to recite Psalm 15 without any narrator to help you, have a listen to the Centerville String Quartet playing just the Version 5 soundtrack music, and let that strengthen your memory. If you need to grab your Bible on the sly to cheat, that’s okay too.

If you’re recently joining us and would like a little more help, here is Version 4 of the Psalm 15 KJV, with a bit more narration removed.

Thanks for joining us this August to learn Psalm 15; have a great weekend!

Have any experiences or tips to share about using this track? Please share in the comments down below!
